page.title: 17LEISURE- CUCKFIELD CHILDREN
page.content: Many of the children interviewed swim regularly at Haywards Heath leisure centre. The most popular sport amongst the boys is soccer and the girls, netball. They watch TV for more than 2 hrs. per day, their favourite programmes being 'Dogtanian and the Three Muskehounds' and 'Street Hawk'. Most prefer pop music to classical, their favourite groups being 'Wham!', 'Duran Duran'. All the children interviewed receive pocket money, 25p to Â£1 per week for which they are expected to do jobs around the house. The most popular comic is Beano and the children also enjoy adventure stories. With regard to holidays most go more than once a year, staying in hotels, their favourite place being France. Most children interviewed thought the leisure facilities in the area were poor.
